alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 24 at 8:02AM CDT until August 25 at 12:06AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River At Trinidad affecting Navarro and Henderson Counties. Trinity River Near Rosser affecting Ellis and Kaufman Counties. Trinity River At Dallas affecting Dallas County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River At Dallas. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, Some low water crossings inundated with cattle and grazing and low water areas under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 33.8 feet. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 14.2 feet Monday morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
